thread.title: The Only Vacation Packing List You Need
thread.title_full: The Only Vacation Packing List You Need

title: The Only Vacation Packing List You Need
text:
Scrunchies Tweezers 
A vacation packing list is especially important when you're traveling to a new place for the first time. While most items left behind can be secured elsewhere, you may not have the time or budget to shop for them on your vacation. 
It's unlikely you'll need everything on this A-to-Z packing list, but I've tried to make it as comprehensive as possible to help you get organized. Obviously, the same vacation destination may not call for both a bathing suit and gloves or mittens...but you never know. It may occur to you that I've left jeans off the list. In tropical climates, they're too hot to wear. In Europe' great cities, they're too informal. But if you're going to some place casual, pack a pair. Good luck, and happy packing. 
In the worst-case scenario, your luggage disappears. Forever. But if you have a copy of your vacation packing list on you - or leave a packing list with a trusted friend or family member while on vacation, you'll have a complete record of any loss.
